Toad_Scorns_Ducks: ^So, this is the Ducks' new Delivery Pig.
^They think it's easy to make cake. They think it's easy to support a neighborhood.
^We're not afraid of them. They're going to fail anyway.

defending_neighborhood: ^Bullies? The rest of the city, they're the real bullies. Did you know? This neighborhood is the single largest haven in the WORLD.
^The city is creeping in. Only we've kept it out.
^You think this cake is just cake? Cake is what we send on holidays. Cake is what we gather to eat.
^Others have tried to disrupt the cake before. They failed.

s: ^Then why do you have to threaten me?

not_afraid_of_ducks: ^We don't want to have to keep dealing with startups! It's better to make an example.
^/Crab snips his claws./ Sorry in advance.
^Bzz. (We won't enjoy it THAT much, I swear!)
^Believe us. You have to - there's too much at stake.
